repo.name: iCarousel
repo.description: A simple, highly customisable, data-driven 3D carousel for iOS and Mac OS

repo.name: HMSegmentedControl
repo.description: A highly customizable drop-in replacement for UISegmentedControl.

repo.name: MGSwipeTableCell
repo.description: An easy to use UITableViewCell subclass that allows to display swippable buttons with a variety of transitions.

repo.name: RSKImageCropper
